data.text: @HastingsRH @ericnuttall Hopefully 100 stays in the rearview mirror for a long time
@bull2moose @HalfbeardCanada @ericnuttall I couldn’t agree more!  It’s like you’re about to raise the roof and then your arms just stop going up.
@HalfbeardCanada @ericnuttall Exactly. It's nice to see, but not the celebration I was expecting it to be. So many lives lost and destroyed. 😞
@ericnuttall Hope the war will not ruin our party
@ericnuttall Great calls the whole way through. One small comment... you will unfortunately need to retire the line of “Canadian Equities trade on par with those in Russia”
@HalfbeardCanada @ericnuttall Agreed, it doesn't have the same feeling of excitement.
